column5: After taking a few years off, this fish on this particular night re-kindled my love for the sport. Now, once again, I am all about it!
nice, good for you and nice 1st post too.
Good stuff....nice fish...welcome to the board.
Ah ha....welcome to the board and nice shootin....say good bye to any "couch time" you used to enjoy...
Welcome to the board DM !!! Samething happened to me a few years ago, with a Large Mouth Bass. Soon as it was in my hands, i knew i loved the sport. Now i fish a bit of everything
